From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To configure the number of times the Cisco IOS software will resend boot requests to a Maintenance Operation Protocol (MOP) server, use the **mopÂ retries**command in global configuration mode. To reinstate the default value, use the no form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: Indicates the number of times the software will resend a MOP boot request. The value is a number from 3 to 24. The default is 8.
